statements: SELECT * FROM subscription_payments
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM subscription_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid'
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM subscription_payments WHERE subscription_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM subscription_payments
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount, payment_status FROM subscription_payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM subscription_payments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM subscription_payments WHERE subscription_id = 123 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT subscription_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM subscription_payments GROUP BY subscription_id HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM subscription_payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC, amount DESC
SELECT subscription_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM subscription_payments GROUP BY subscription_id ORDER BY total_payments DESC
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_name, subscription_amount FROM subscriptions
SELECT user_id, subscription_name, start_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_amount > 50
SELECT transaction_id, amount_paid, payment_method FROM payment_transactions
SELECT subscription_id, MAX(transaction_date) AS last_payment_date FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY subscription_id
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_amount > 50 ORDER BY subscription_name DESC;
SELECT subscription_name, subscription_amount, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM subscriptions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT subscription_name, subscription_amount, payment_method FROM subscriptions INNER JOIN payment_transactions ON subscriptions.subscription_id = payment_transactions.subscription_id;
SELECT subscription_name, subscription_amount, DATEDIFF(next_billing_date, start_date) AS days_until_next_billing FROM subscriptions WHERE DATEDIFF(next_billing_date, start_date) < 30;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, price FROM plans WHERE price < 50;
SELECT subscription_id, customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY plan_name DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_paid FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans WHERE plan_name LIKE '%basic%' AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions s JOIN recurring_payments rp ON s.subscription_id = rp.subscription_id WHERE s.end_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, sum(payment_amount) FROM payment_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING sum(payment_amount) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, s.start_date, s.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id;

SELECT p.payment_id, pm.method_type, ph.payment_date FROM payment_methods pm INNER JOIN payment_history ph ON pm.method_id = ph.method_id INNER JOIN subscriptions s ON ph.subscription_id = s.subscription_id INNER JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, s.start_date, ph.payment_amount FROM users u INNER JOIN subscriptions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id INNER JOIN payment_history ph ON s.subscription_id = ph.subscription_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_plan FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM subscription_plans WHERE interval = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_method FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_plans WHERE price > 50 AND interval = 'monthly';
SELECT recurring_id, subscription_id, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE is_active = TRUE;
